actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that advertising of alcoholic beverages is not a deductible expense.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, that advertising of alcoholic beverages shall not be treated as a tax deductible expense. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 162(l))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that advertising of alcoholic beverages is not a deductible expense.
